description: Ian has foolishly ended up in Kali's class room at Cuntington school for boys. After a thorough boot worshipping, he is stripped down, has his hands tied behind his back and the punishment begins. Such pale skin doesn't take long to turn red and Kali shows no mercy as she moves from one part of his body to the next but I think she enjoys Ian's virgin ass the most!
title: Princess Kali and Ian Frost
